column4: I have been using Dapper since january and its still slow should I make clear install? Will it make it any better?
A64 3000+, 200GB sata, 1G UTT
you can't use hdparm on an sata drive
is it hard drive speed that is slow ?
so they say?
no and yes
how can I test it ? hdparm -tT is not best way to term fast or slow?
hdparm doesn't work on sata drives unless your connected via the ide connection on the drive.
ok, so how can I speed things up? Go for gentoo?
is it jsut disk access you find slow or the entire system ?
both
you won't notice any difference on a Gentoo system
are you running the 64 bit kernel ?
Livecd is faster than this
32bit
run sudo top (and see what's taking the most resources)
top
yeah
did you install binary drivers for your ati card ?
I am using fglrx, direct rendering is on
your using the default Ubuntu kernel, not the 64 bit kernel right ?
K7
ok that's fine
